title: 72. Med Aesthetics, Marketing + Advice to New Esties with Spa Owner Isabelle McLeod.
description:
Hi Roomies!! In this episode I chat with my friend Isabelle McCloeod, licensed esthetician.

Follow Isabelle on IG + Tiktok: @IsabelleMcLeodSF

Email: IsabelleMcLeod@gmail.com

ISABELLE'S RESOURCE GUIDE 

SIMPLE - A Roadmap to Marketing -- if anyone is interested in further information or coaching on this. Please shoot me an email!

Staff Education

Identity & Branding

Medical Credentials

Patient Education

Loyalty & Retention

External Marketing

Reading List

Facial Rejuvenation Surgery, Bernard L. Kayle

Manual of Chemical Peels, Dr. Ruben

Bobbi Brown Beauty, Bobbi Brown & Annemarie Iverson

Evaluation and Treatment of the Aging Face, Melvin L Elson

Atlas of Skin Cancer, Anthony Du Vivier

Sauer Hall Manual of Skin Diseases - 7th Edition, Gordon C. Sauer & John Hall

Treatments for Skin of Color, Susan C. Taylor

How to Win Friends & Influence People, Dale Carnegie

Cosmeceuticals: Procedures in Cosmetic Dermatology Series, Zoe Draelos, MD.

Cosmetic Dermatology: Products & Procedures, Zoe Draelos, MD.

Book with Isabelle

Have a topic request or question for a future episode? Comment on my latest @myestytessa.

MY SOCIAL MEDIA + SHOPS

For more details on my products, visit www.freeskinbytessa.com, or follow along on instagram @freeskinbytessa.

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa

Music: Sweet by LiQWYD | https://www.instagram.com/liqwyd Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US
